an3.37:1.1: “Atthamiyam, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunnam maharajanam amacca parisajja imam lokam anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.2: ‘kacci bahu manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti’ti.
an3.37:1.3: Catuddasim, bhikkhave, pakkhassa catunnam maharajanam putta imam lokam anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.4: ‘kacci bahu manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti’ti.
an3.37:1.5: Tadahu, bhikkhave, uposathe pannarase cattaro maharajano samanneva imam lokam anuvicaranti:
an3.37:1.6: ‘kacci bahu manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti’ti.
an3.37:2.1: Sace, bhikkhave, appaka honti manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti.
an3.37:2.2: Tamenam, bhikkhave, cattaro maharajano devanam tavatimsanam sudhammaya sabhaya sannisinnanam sannipatitanam arocenti:
an3.37:2.3: ‘appaka kho, marisa, manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti’ti.
an3.37:2.4: Tena kho, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa anattamana honti:
an3.37:2.5: ‘dibba vata, bho, kaya parihayissanti, paripurissanti asurakaya’ti.
an3.37:3.1: Sace pana, bhikkhave, bahu honti manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti.
an3.37:3.2: Tamenam, bhikkhave, cattaro maharajano devanam tavatimsanam sudhammaya sabhaya sannisinnanam sannipatitanam arocenti:
an3.37:3.3: ‘bahu kho, marisa, manussa manussesu matteyya petteyya samanna brahmanna kule jetthapacayino uposatham upavasanti patijagaronti punnani karonti’ti.
an3.37:3.4: Tena, bhikkhave, deva tavatimsa attamana honti:
an3.37:3.5: ‘dibba vata bho kaya paripurissanti, parihayissanti asurakaya’ti.
an3.37:4.1: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, sakko devanamindo deve tavatimse anunayamano tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
an3.37:6.1: Sa kho panesa, bhikkhave, sakkena devanamindena gatha duggita na sugita dubbhasita na subhasita.
an3.37:6.3: Sakko hi, bhikkhave, devanamindo avitarago avitadoso avitamoho.
an3.37:7.1: Yo ca kho so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava brahmacariyo katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto, tassa kho etam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kallam vacanaya:
an3.37:9.2: So hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitarago vitadoso vitamoho”ti.
